What is the bill number that classifies male and female impersonators as adult cabaret performers in Tennessee?
HB 9
What is the potential consequence of violating the law for the first time?
A misdemeanor
What are the consequences for subsequent violations of the law?
Felony charge, up to six years in prison, and a $3,000 fine
What is the deadline for the governor to sign the bill?
A little over a week from the article's publication
What is the stage name of Slade Kyle when they perform in drag?
Bella DuBalle
What is the name of the nightclub where Slade Kyle is the show host and director?
Atomic Rose
What is the name of the executive director of the ACLU in Tennessee?
Kathy Sinback
What are the two types of bills that Tennessee Gov. Bill Lee is expected to sign?
Ban on drag and ban on gender-affirming care for trans youth
What is the name of the drag show planned at the Atomic Rose on April 1?
Brick Ball
Which two trans advocates are credited for throwing the first brick during the Stonewall rebellion?
Marsha P. Johnson and Sylvia Rivera
